sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import Spinner from '../layout/Spinner' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Repos from '../repos/Repos' const User = ({ user, loading, getUser, getUserRepos, repos, match }) => { useEffect(() => { getUser(this.props.match.params.login) getUserRepos(this.props.match.params.login) }) const { name, avatar_url, location, bio, login, company, html_url, blog, followers, following, public_repos, public_gists, hireable } = user if (loading) return return ( Back to Search Hireable: {''} {hireable ? : }

{name}

Location: {location}

{bio && (

Bio

{bio}

)} Visit GitHub Profile
  • {login && Username: {login} }
    • {/*
  • {company && Company: {login} }
  • {html_url && ( Website: {login} )}
    • */}
Follower: {followers}
Following: {following}
Public Repos: {public_repos}
Public Gists: {public_gists}

Latest repos in ascending order:

 ) } User.propTypes = { loading: PropTypes.bool, user: PropTypes.object.isRequired, repos: PropTypes.array.isRequired, getUser: PropTypes.func.isRequired, getUserRepos: PropTypes.func.isRequired } export default User
